nml_option.name: config_soma_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in SOMA.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer. Typically 40 or larger.

nml_option.name: config_soma_domain_width
nml_option.description: Approximate radius of the SOMA domain.

nml_option.name: config_soma_center_latitude
nml_option.description: Latitude for the center of the SOMA basin.

nml_option.name: config_soma_center_longitude
nml_option.description: Longitude for the center of the SOMA basin.

nml_option.name: config_soma_phi
nml_option.description: Scale factor controlling width of continential slope. Typically around 0.1

nml_option.name: config_soma_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the SOMA test case.

nml_option.name: config_soma_shelf_width
nml_option.description: Non-dimensional measure of continential shelf. Typically negative.

nml_option.name: config_soma_ref_density
nml_option.description: Reference density for the SOMA test case.

nml_option.name: config_soma_density_difference
nml_option.description: Density difference between surface and bottom waters for the SOMA test case.

nml_option.name: config_soma_thermocline_depth
nml_option.description: Depth over which majority of initial stratification is placed.

nml_option.name: config_soma_density_difference_linear
nml_option.description: Fraction of stratification put into linear profile extending from surface to bottom.

nml_option.name: config_soma_surface_temperature
nml_option.description: Surface temperature value used in initial condition.

nml_option.name: config_soma_surface_salinity
nml_option.description: Surface salinity value used in initial condition.

nml_option.name: config_soma_use_surface_temp_restoring
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if surface temperature restoring is to be used.

nml_option.name: config_soma_surface_temp_restoring_at_center_latitude
nml_option.description: Surface restoring temperature value at center latitutde.

nml_option.name: config_soma_surface_temp_restoring_latitude_gradient
nml_option.description: Surface restoring temperature gradient in latitudal direction.

nml_option.name: config_soma_restoring_temp_piston_vel
nml_option.description: Restoring piston velocity for surface temperature.
